actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to include hearing aids and eyeglass lenses (and related examinations), and dentures, among the items and services for which payment may be made under the supplementary medical insurance program.

summary.text: Includes hearing aids, eyeglass lenses (and related examinations), and dentures, among the items and services for which payment may be made under the supplementary medical insurance program (Medicare) title XVIII of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to include hearing aids and eyeglass lenses (and related examinations), and dentures, among the items and services for which payment may be made under the supplementary medical insurance program.
